article_title: Supreme Court ruling on Obamacare could create 'chaos,' experts say
article_text: Share your opinion on this topic by sending a letter to the editor to tctvoice@madison.com. Include your full name, hometown and phone number. Your name and town will be published. The phone number is for verification purposes only. Please keep your letter to 250 words or less.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , michael gotzler, jonathan jaffery, rick abrams, supreme court, health insurance exchange, medicare, single-payer health care, wisconsin medical society, qti group, wps health insurance, scott walker
article_metadata.author: Steven Elbow | The Capital Times

og.description: Local panelists representing doctors, businesses and insurers say Obamacare needs to be fixed, not repealed.
